alert.note: Alert for Burke; Richmond (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 04 at 9:56AM EST until January 04 at 10:45AM EST by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Burke County in east central Georgia... Eastern Richmond County in east central Georgia... Central Edgefield County in central South Carolina... Barnwell County in central South Carolina... Northwestern Bamberg County in central South Carolina... Southwestern Lexington County in central South Carolina... Aiken County in central South Carolina... Northwestern Orangeburg County in central South Carolina... * Until 1045 AM EST. * At 956 AM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Edgefield County Airport to near Jackson to near Perkins, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Aiken, Barnwell, Savannah River Site, Aiken Mall, Plant Vogtle, Williston, Blackville, New Ellenton, Jackson, Sardis, Alexander, USC Aiken, Aiken Municipal Airport, Citizens Park, Gloverville, Aiken State Park, Barnwell State Park, Graniteville, Burnettown and Wagener. This includes Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 11 and 36. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM EST for east central Georgia...and central South Carolina. For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM EST for east central Georgia...and central South Carolina.
